data.title: Yummy Bubble Tea
data.text: This place allows you to choose what level of sweetness you want for the drink. I ordered a milk tea with bubbles. The tea was good. The tapiocal balls were not too hard or too soft; just right. Will visit again if I go to that area again.

data.title: Quick delicious drinks
data.text: I ordered four different drinks and they made them all very quickly. I ordered for myself the jasmine green tea with strawberry with passion fruit jelly. It was sweet delicious and refreshing in the Texas humidity. They have a variety of flavors to acquire any tastebud.

data.title: Unimpressed
data.text: They charge more for their drinks than Boba latte and Fat straws but have less options to choose from. Was disappointed. Will be using fat straws only from this point forward. Very very nice and helpful employees though.

data.title: What Was I Thinking?
data.text: Yes, I love Groupons. Yes, I love smoothies. There it was, right in front of me, an opportunity to buy a Groupon for a smoothie place...and easy to find. It just wasn't for me. I got the strawberry and banana smoothie, and it took me too hours to finish off the drink. I couldn't decide whether I just didn't like it, or whether the too-much-banana taste was the problem. It also had bits of strawberry in it, which would have been wonderful; but somehow the only think strawberry about it was the color. My daughter got a smoothie drink with bubbles in it. I swear the bubbles inundated the drink, and the bubbles were only put in because with our two large smoothies, there was money left over on the Groupon to buy three bubbles. No Thanks!!! This place just didn't do it for me. The wait staff, though, were really nice and friendly.

data.title: Bubble Tea at its best!
data.text: Can I just say I love, Love, LOVE this place. Fruitealicious is like the best ever. They have such a wide span of drink choices that you can never go wrong with. All the employees are so kind & courteous & very helpful in helping you narrow down your selection. I can never say that I've ever had a bad drink from there. The place is a really awesome place to go hangout with friends or to go study at. They have free wifi, an assortment of magazines to read, & also a ton of board games to play with as well. I'm constantly going there & always trying out a new flavor or combination assortment. Make sure you join the Fruitealicious Rewards Program you'll obtain great benefits from it. So I once again will say that I highly recommend this place to everyone out there it's the BEST!!!!
